<!-- Copilot instructions — concise, actionable, repo-specific guidance -->

# Copilot instructions for Metic.ai (enhanced)

Purpose: help an AI coding agent be immediately productive in this repo by calling out the project's structure, conventions, and exact commands.

## 1) Big picture architecture
- **Next.js 15 app** (`src/app`) that is **SEO-first** and heavily uses programmatic page generation for location pages (US states + Indian cities).
- **Two main generated routes**: `artificial-intelligence-ai-services-in-{location}` and `machine-learning-services-in-{location}` (generated by `generate_ml_pages.py`).
- **Contact system**: API routes (`src/app/api/contact/`) with SendGrid integration for form submissions.
- **Component architecture**: UI components in `src/app/components/ui/` (Button, Header, Footer) with consistent design system.

## 2) Key workflows & commands
- **Local dev**: `npm run dev` (starts Next dev server)
- **Build**: `npm run build`; **Production**: `npm run start`
- **Generate location pages**: Edit `generate_ml_pages.py` then run `python generate_ml_pages.py` (Windows) or `python3 generate_ml_pages.py` (Unix).
- **Bulk content updates**: Use PowerShell scripts (`add_ai_content_simple.ps1`, `fix_emails.ps1`) for mass page updates.
- **After generation**: Always update `src/app/sitemap.ts` (sitemap priorities matter; Michigan pages prioritized ~0.95–0.99).

## 3) Project conventions (exact patterns)
- **Metadata**: Every page must export `metadata: Metadata` with title (~70–80 chars), description (150–160 chars), keywords array, and `alternates.canonical`.
  ```ts
  export const metadata: Metadata = { 
    title: "Page Title | Service - Metic.ai", 
    description: "150-160 char description", 
    keywords: ["..."], 
    alternates: { canonical: "https://metic.ai/path/" } 
  }
  ```
- **Page locations**: Service pages at `src/app/{slug}/page.tsx`. Generated location pages at `src/app/*-services-in-{location}/page.tsx`.
- **Styling utility**: Use `cn()` from `@/lib/utils` for conditional classNames (combines clsx + tailwind-merge).
- **Icons**: `lucide-react` only (see existing imports in generated pages for examples).

## 4) Styling & design system
- **Tailwind theme**: Custom orange theme defined in `tailwind.config.js`
  - `primary-orange`: "#FF6B35" (vibrant morning orange)
  - `secondary-orange`: "#FF8C42" (warm sunset orange)  
  - `dark-orange`: "#E55A2B" (deep sunrise)
  - `light-orange`: "#FFB886" (soft morning glow)
- **Button variants**: `primary`, `secondary`, `outline`, `ghost`, `link` (see `src/app/components/ui/Button.tsx`)
- **Typography**: Inter (sans) + JetBrains Mono (mono) fonts loaded in `layout.tsx`

## 5) Code patterns & files to reference
- **Generator**: `generate_ml_pages.py` — look at `get_us_state_content()`/`get_indian_city_content()` for content mapping and naming.
- **Sitemap**: `src/app/sitemap.ts` — ensure new routes are added and priorities set correctly.
- **UI components**: `src/app/components/ui/Button.tsx` (variants: primary, outline, secondary, ghost).
- **Layout examples**: `src/app/page.tsx`, `src/app/layout.tsx` and existing generated pages (e.g., `src/app/artificial-intelligence-ai-services-in-california/`).
- **API patterns**: `src/app/api/contact/route.ts` for SendGrid email integration examples.

## 6) SEO & content rules (strict)
- Target keyword in H1 and first paragraph. Use `<strong>` for emphasis when appropriate.
- FAQ sections must include JSON-LD FAQ schema when present.

## COMPLETE SEO OPTIMIZATION FRAMEWORK (based on Ahmedabad page)

For 100% on-page SEO, VSO, ASO, and GEO optimization:

**Metadata Template (copy exactly):**
```ts
export const metadata = {
  title: "Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION} | #1 AI Company In {STATE/REGION} - Metic.ai",
  description: "Leading Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION} with 2100+ successful AI implementations. Expert AI services, machine learning solutions & AI development. Transform your business with 60% cost savings & 3x faster delivery.",
  keywords: [
    "Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION}",
    "AI Company In {LOCATION}",
    "AI Service In {LOCATION}", 
    "AI Firm In {LOCATION}",
    "AI Development Company In {LOCATION}",
    "Best AI Company In {LOCATION}",
    "Top AI Company {STATE/REGION}",
    // Add 12 more supporting keywords
  ],
  openGraph: {
    title: "Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION} | #1 AI Company In {STATE/REGION} - Metic.ai",
    siteName: "Metic.ai - AI Company In {LOCATION}",
    // Enhanced OG metadata
  }
}
```

**Required Content Sections:**
1. **Hero H1:** `<strong>Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION}</strong> | Leading AI Company In {STATE/REGION}`
2. **Hero Description:** Must include "Looking for the best AI Company In {LOCATION}? Metic.ai is the premier Artificial Intelligence Company In {LOCATION}"
3. **FAQ Section:** 6 questions with JSON-LD schema (see Ahmedabad page for exact format)
4. **About Section:** Company authority with local focus
5. **Testimonials:** Client reviews mentioning location
6. **Enhanced CTA:** Keywords in headlines

**Triple Schema Implementation:**
- Organization schema with location data
- FAQ schema (6 strategic questions)  
- Article schema for content authority

**VSO Keywords in Content:**
- "Looking for the best..."
- "Which is the leading..."
- Natural language throughout
- Supporting keywords in badges/tags

Reference `src/app/artificial-intelligence-ai-services-in-ahmedabad/page.tsx` as the complete optimization template.

## 8) Environment & configuration
- **Contact forms**: Require `SENDGRID_API_KEY` and `SENDGRID_FROM_EMAIL` environment variables.
- **Performance**: Next.js config includes security headers, image optimization, and compression (`next.config.ts`).
- **Dev tools**: Husky + lint-staged configured for git hooks (check `package.json`).

## 9) Common gotchas
- **CSS issues**: If Tailwind classes don't apply, run `npm run build` to regenerate CSS and check `content` globs in `tailwind.config.js`.
- **Missing icons**: Verify `lucide-react` import names and casing.
- **Bulk operations**: When adding many locations, use the generator or PowerShell scripts — do not create dozens of pages manually.
- **Windows development**: Python scripts work with both `python` and `python3` commands on Windows.

## 10) Integration points
- **Email**: SendGrid API integration for contact forms (`@sendgrid/mail` package).
- **SEO**: Structured data, sitemap generation, and meta tag optimization throughout.
- **Analytics**: Component ready in `src/components/Analytics.tsx`.

If anything here is unclear or you want these instructions expanded (examples, linting rules, or test commands), tell me which parts to expand and I'll iterate.
